en: George is playing with his ball in the garden.
George, you're doing it all wrong!
This is how to catch a ball.
What a cheeky little one, pig Peppa is.
zh: 佩奇真是一头顽皮的小猪。

en: Maybe Peppa is teasing George just a bit too much.
zh: 也许佩奇逗乔治逗得有点过份了！

en: Peppa, have you been teasing George?
zh: 佩奇，你是不是在逗乔治玩啊？

en: Not really, Mummy, I was teaching him how to catch.
zh: 不是的，妈妈，我在教乔治接球。

en: Really? Oh, well, I know a game that will teach George how to catch.
zh: 真的吗？哦，好的，我知道一个游戏能教会乔治如何接球。

en: Peppa, you take the ball and stand over there.
and George, you stand over there.
Good! You have to throw the ball to each other.
and I have to try and catch it.
I'm the piggy in the middle.
Mummy is the piggy in the middle.
zh: 妈妈是中间的一头小猪。

en: Now you throw the ball to Peppa.
George can't throw the ball past Mummy Pig.
zh: 乔治不能把球扔给佩奇（越过妈妈）。

en: Silly George. I can do that, too.
zh: 傻呼呼的乔治。我也能那样做。

en: but she's too big and has got stuck.
now it's your turn to be piggy.
zh: 现在轮到你来做中间的小猪。

en: Caught it! George, you're the piggy!
zh: 接住！乔治，你是中间的小猪！

en: Oh, dear! Peppa, you shouldn't tease George like that.
zh: 哦，天啊！佩奇，你不应该这样戏弄乔治。

en: Daddy, George is too little to play ''Piggy in the middle''.
zh: 爸爸，乔治太小了不能做“中间的小猪”。

en: Oh, I'm sure he's big enough.
Yes, it is. I just gave George a helping hand.
zh: 是公平的。我只是帮了乔治一下。

en: Mummy, can I have a helping hand?
zh: 妈妈，你可以帮我一下吗？
